reviews.customers_say: Customers find the robe gorgeous and sexy, with beautiful quality and a flattering fit. The softness receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it lays beautifully against the skin, and they appreciate its comfort, noting it's not scratchy or uncomfortable. While some customers love the material, others find it cheap. The robe offers good value for money, and one customer mentions it fits every curve.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feel of the fabric is so soft
items.body: I will say this is one of the most beautiful pieces of lingerie that I own for the price it is amazing the feel and the texture of the lace so soft and my husband absolutely loves it. Read more
items.author: Gamma Reynolds

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars great gift
items.body: Looked very hot on my wife and seems to be good quality Read more
items.author: Steve

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars sexy red nightgown
items.body: the size was perfect and the nightgown is super sexy and has nice material. The color was as advertised Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lingerie Elevated!!
items.body: I recently picked up a lace kimono and I've got to tell you, it's an absolute game-changer for my lingerie collection. This piece is sheer perfection, literally and figuratively! It fits like a dream, which is a rare find. You know how it can be tricky to get something that drapes just right without feeling too tight or too loose? Well, this kimono nails it. What really blew me away was how it took my usual lingerie pieces from nice to wow. It adds such an elegant and sophisticated touch, effortlessly elevating any look. And let's talk about the price – it's incredibly affordable. Finding something that feels this luxurious without breaking the bank is such a win. Honestly, it's such a versatile piece too. Whether you're looking to add a bit of flair to a simple lingerie set or you want something to make your evening in feel extra special, this lace kimono is the way to go. I couldn't recommend it enough. Definitely consider adding one to your collection; it's worth it. Read more
items.author: Product Provocateur

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits great. I went up a size as I normally do with clothes from here
items.author: densie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sensual
items.body: Very sexy and charming, seductive at first sight, you'll fall in love with him at first sight. An excellent choice to surprise your partner. Read more
items.author: Geobany Lopez

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Kool
items.body: Still looks sexy on her but Not what the out looks like in person The dark blue silk parts is not it all But still worth she says it really comfy to wear around the house Read more
items.author: colby dawkins

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's nice
items.body: This robe isn't bad at all. A tiny bit on the stiffer side and not quite as soft as Avidlove's typical lingerie but, it's still nice and does the job. Husband approved. Read more
items.author: Andrea

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 1white, Blue, Apricot, Navy Blue, Orange, Dark Red, Dark Green, Red, Rose Red, Lilac, Baby Blue, Wine Red, Khaki, Lavender. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
